Name: pericardium cancer
Definition: A peripheral nervous system disease that involves an acute loss of function of the lumbar plexus

Name: obsolete secondary malignant neoplasm of lymph nodes of multiple site
Definition: A peripheral nervous system disease that involves an acute loss of function of the lumbar plexus
Synonym: secondary malignant neoplasm of lymph nodes of multiple sites (disorder)

Name: malignant cardiac germ cell tumor
Definition: A syndrome characterized by acute brain damage and liver function problems. It has been associated with aspirin consumption by children with viral illness
Synonym: malignant germ cell tumor of the Heart

Name: obsolete metastasis to heart
Definition: A syndrome characterized by acute brain damage and liver function problems. It has been associated with aspirin consumption by children with viral illness

Name: obsolete macular or paramacular focal retinitis and retinochoroiditis
Definition: A syndrome characterized by acute brain damage and liver function problems. It has been associated with aspirin consumption by children with viral illness

Name: heart sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma and malignant neoplasm of heart that is located_in the heart.

Name: endocardium cancer
Definition: An organ system cancer located_in the retroperitoneal space that is manifested in retroperitoneal space in the abdominal cavity behind the peritoneum.

Name: heart lymphoma
Definition: A sebaceous gland disease characterized by areas of blackheads

Name: myocardium cancer
Definition: A peripheral vascular disease characterized by blood trapped in the penis that is unable to drain.
